org.apache.ignite.osgi.classloaders

Class BundleDelegatingClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.apache.ignite.osgi.classloaders.BundleDelegatingClassLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerSweepClassLoader

    public class BundleDelegatingClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
    A ClassLoader implementation delegating to a given OSGi bundle, and to the specified ClassLoader as a fallback.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle
      The bundle which loaded Ignite.
      protected ClassLoader clsLdr
      The fallback classloader, expected to be the ignite-core classloader.
